title: TokenLabel
description: Label showing a token name and balance formatted. The label is clickable with a default TokenInformationAction if no other action is set

id.description: The unique identifier for the element. Optional.

onLongPress.description: Action to be started when long press is performed

onClick.description: Action to be started when click or tap is performed

visible.description: Visibility of this object. Optional, defaults to true

tokenName.description: Token display name shown if not known by application

decimals.description: Decimals amount is formatted with if not known by application
